With a meticulous approach to research, he has published numerous papers that explore the socio-political structures of this intriguing era. Known for his engaging teaching style, he seamlessly integrates historical analysis with interactive discussions, fostering a dynamic learning environment. Outside the classroom, he enjoys participating in historical reenactments and curating exhibitions that make history accessible to the public.
